summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North Thirty-ninth Street from Dayton Avenue to Third Avenue N.W. et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 16879, creating Local Improvement District No. 1587 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
